TextView.android:text: “LAISmart”Developed by Qu Yonghua, State Key Laboratory of Remote Sensing Science, Beijing Normal University. \nUsers can download it for free.“LAIsmart”The measurement accuracy has been compared with that of imported instruments（LAI-2000，LAI-2200C, TRAC, AccuPAR）. Some results can be seen from the author's paper.\nContact information：qyh@bnu.edu.cn. Reference paper“Qu, Y., Potential and Limits of Retrieving Conifer Leaf Area Index Using Smartphone-Based Method. Forests 2017, 8.”
